long_description: Designed for minimalist travelers and backpackers, the large-sized Therm-a-Rest Tapered Sheet is designed to fit your tapered Therm-a-Rest air mattress (not included). Cinch the elastic drawcord at the foot of the sheet to create a snug fit around your tapered mattress; matches up with the Therm-a-Rest Tech Blanket (not included). Brushed fabric is soft against the skin; offers an added layer of protection for your mattress. Sheet features a bottom center strap to help secure sheet to mattress. Polyester Therm-a-Rest Tapered Sheet is machine-washable for easy care. Stuff sack included. Closeout.
